ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: inov8__Jan_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__Feb_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__Mar_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__Apr_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__May_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__Jun_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__Jul_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__Aug_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__Sep_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__Oct_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__Nov_Hours__c < 0 || inov8__Dec_Hours__c < 0
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Actual hours worked cannot be negative numbers
